column5: Anyone have a Chapleau area fishing and bug report?  Water temps?  I am heading up on Wednesday into the backcountry and would appreciate any relevant info.  Also, what online weather source is the most reliable for that area?  The several that I have found have widely different weather forecasts for the week.  Anyone have an idea about which one is best?  Thanks in advance!

Bugs - oh ya! but on the decline  temps- 60's for the ones you mentioned to me before....maybe warmer on the shallow ones  weather - bring rainsuits, warm clothes and shorts/tees It doesn't matter which one you watch. Our weather forcasts change daily it seems.....   TDunn
Tyler - thanks again!  Hope you are slaying them in the SSM area.
probly into the 70's now for sure.  skitters are bad from 9-11pm but you should already be in bed getting ready for the morning bite! lol.  have a great vacation
couldn't find 60's the last two days.  Saw 5 degree change from morn to night.  she's getting hot out!
Appreciate the reply.  Probably won't be getting to bed when I should be!  Mornings get tougher and tougher as I age.
